WNYC
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING 9 N.Y. 7

May 29, 1944
Mr. Frank 2* Schooley
Executive Secretary
The Nat*l. Assn.of Educational Broadcasters
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois:
Dear Frank:
I have your May 24th note and the
copies of the FMBI and HAB letters. I guess there*s
nothing you can do about it. Whose idea was it, at
the 8tart, that we could get in on an,organizational
basis ? Asfar as I*m concerned, I don’t think we ought
to shed any tears.
It was a good idea to send a half-hour
discussing the whole problem. If we accomplished
nothing else, I, for one, know how most of the other
guys feel about joining up with other groups.
Sincerely yours.
MSNrsd
.188
‘New York City’s Own Station”—830 Kc.
